column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////F&B: We ordered the Porterhouse Steak
column2: which was perfect for our family of four
column5: and I order this dish often)
column7: and the dessert Chocolate Creme Pie (so silky and good
column8: like a creamy Oreo). The complimentary bread was great too (and huge!) with easy to spread butter with a bit of salt!
